title: Context filtering error: User can't log in after upgrade
content:
After the upgrade, when the user tries to log in to the suite, the login attempt fails with the following error:

"httpStatus":500, "message":"Context filtering error"}

Cause

This happens because, for security considerations, users having the Business Intelligence Integration or OPB Remote Agent role can’t log in to Agent Interface or Service Portal.

Solution

Ensure the user doesn't have either the Business Intelligence Integration or OPB Remote Agent role.

For information on managing roles, see Manage roles in IdM Admin Portal.
